races.name: Human
races.description: Resilient and adaptable, humans are known for their tenacity and diplomatic nature. They form the backbone of the Alliance and thrive in all walks of life.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Stout and sturdy, dwarves hail from the mountains of Khaz Modan. Their legendary resilience makes them formidable warriors and survivors.

racial_ability.name: Stoneform
racial_ability.description: Turn to stone, removing all poison and bleed effects and reducing damage taken by 10% for 2 turns.

races.name: Night Elf
races.description: Ancient and graceful, night elves have lived for thousands of years in the forests of Kalimdor. Their agility and connection to nature make them elusive opponents.

racial_ability.name: Shadowmeld
racial_ability.description: Slip into the shadows, gaining a chance to avoid the next enemy attack entirely.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Brilliant and eccentric, gnomes possess an insatiable curiosity and a knack for engineering. What they lack in size, they make up for in intellect.

racial_ability.name: Escape Artist
racial_ability.description: Break free of any movement impairing effects and gain a small burst of energy.

races.name: Orc
races.description: Fierce and honorable, orcs are mighty warriors from Draenor. Their blood runs hot with the spirit of battle, driving them to feats of savage strength.

racial_ability.name: Blood Fury
racial_ability.description: Unleash your inner rage, increasing damage dealt by 15% for 3 turns.

races.name: Undead
races.description: Freed from the Lich King's control, the Forsaken are undead humans who seek their own destiny. Their cursed existence grants them unnatural resilience.

racial_ability.name: Will of the Forsaken
racial_ability.description: Break free of any fear, sleep, or charm effects through sheer force of will.

races.name: Tauren
races.description: Noble and peaceful, the tauren are a proud race of nomadic hunters. Their immense size and strength make them natural protectors of the land.

racial_ability.name: War Stomp
racial_ability.description: Stomp the ground, stunning all enemies for 1 turn.

races.name: Troll
races.description: Cunning and spiritual, jungle trolls are renowned for their regenerative abilities and connection to ancient voodoo magic.

racial_ability.name: Berserking
racial_ability.description: Enter a berserker rage, increasing attack speed and gaining an extra action for 2 turns.
